<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Containers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add backpack(s) to the cargo space of vehicle. Classname list of available backpacks is [[ArmA 2 OA: Backpacks|here]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value>In Arma 3, arguments for this command are local (<template><title>EffArg</title><part><name index="1"/><value>cmd</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>arg</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>loc</value></part></template>). For global variant see [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]]</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>vehicle [[addBackpackCargo]] [backpackClassName, count] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle to add the backpack to </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [backpackClassName, count]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> backpackClassName: [[String]] - backpack classname</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> count: [[Number]] - number of backpacks to add. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[this]] [[addBackpackCargo]] ["TK_RPG_Backpack_EP1", 2];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_apc [[addBackpackCargo]] ["US_Patrol_Pack_EP1", 4];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[backpackContainer]], [[firstBackpack]], [[unitBackpack]], [[backpack]], [[backpackCargo]], [[getBackpackCargo]], [[backpackItems]], [[addBackpack]], [[addBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[removeBackpack]], [[clearBackpackCargo]], [[clearBackpackCargoGlobal]], [[clearAllItemsFromBackpack]], [[loadBackpack]], [[backpackSpaceFor]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[addItemToBackpack]], [[removeItemFromBackpack]], [[everyBackpack]]</value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
